meanings.sent1: The mutterers gathered in the corner to discuss their secret plans.
meanings.sent2: The mutterers in the library were so focused on their books that they didn't notice the time passing.
meanings.sent3: The mutterers at the party were like a group of whispering conspirators.
meanings.sent4: The mutterers in the office seemed to have their own secret language.
meanings.sent5: The mutterers in the courtroom made it hard to hear the judge's instructions.

meanings.definition: Those who speak in a low, indistinct tone.
meanings.sent1: The mutterers in the movie theater annoyed the other viewers with their constant whispering.
meanings.sent2: The mutterers in the crowd made it difficult to understand what was being said on stage.
meanings.sent3: The mutterers in the restaurant created a background hum of conversation.
meanings.sent4: The mutterers in the classroom were like a chorus of distant voices.
meanings.sent5: The mutterers in the park blended into the sounds of nature around them.
